attributes.action: Ban neonicotinoid pesticides that harm  bees and other pollinators in the UK
attributes.additional_details: If bees and other pollinators are harmed by the use of neonicotinoid pesticides and such agents that will impact directly the pollination of crops flora and deplete fauna. If allowed it would create food shortages and drive humanity to rely on the use of GM crops. Government know the science and harm that neonicotinoid pesticides cause to bees and other pollinators and supported restrictions on them across the EU prior to Brexit. Do not derogate now enshrine it within  UK Law post Brexit.
attributes.background: Use existing legislation or new legislation to ban to make illegal the use of neonicotinoid pesticides and  other associated agents that harm and hinder bees and such other pollinators absolutely Enshrine the same for giving Farming Subsidies UK, agreeing Farming Trade Deals, giving Foreign Farm Aid

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Overturn the decision to allow the use of neonicotinoid pesticides
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569214

Continue the ban on the use of Neonicotinoids
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563943
